Name: Bloom: The Forest Burns
About the game: A free stand-alone chapter from the world of Bloom: Memories. The dreklings have been drawn to the forest and they are threatening everything with their fires! You must find help and stop them before it's too late in this action adventure RPG. How will you do it? Peacefully? With careful preparation? Or will you charge in and battle your way through? It's up to you. Features: Creatures that use hearing, smelling, vision AND emotions to sense the world! Varied gameplay including stealth and other peaceful options Uncover imaginative plants and abilities And much more!!
